pr_title: ISPN-10836 deserialization whitelist per cache manager

timeline.bodyText: I don't think we should say CacheManager interface, this doesn't actually exist and the white list is on the EmbeddedCacheManager interface. Instead we should say that the whitelist is applied to the CacheContainer, because this also applies when setting the white list via System properties on the server.
timeline.author: ryanemerson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -207,6 +209,13 @@ properties or specifying them in the {brandname} configuration.
 include::config_examples/deserialization_whitelist.xml[]
 ----
 
+[NOTE]
+====
+Java classes that you add to the deserialization whitelist apply to the
+{brandname} `CacheManager` interface and can deserialize to all caches that the
+`CacheManager` controls.
